messages.message:
Does anyone here would like to keep the following environments? I'd like to delete them :slightly_smiling_face: cc @Anant @Heymian @sudeep @jtau

```https://platform.instabase.com/account/login
https://dogfood.instabase.com/account/login```

Yes, we need to delete the GKE clusters, they are not useful and are not representative of even a proper IB Classic deployment since they were setup manually.

The action item here is to rename the existing AWS 24.07 release sandbox to be  platform.instabase.com (http://platform.instabase.com).
I assume platform.instabase.com (http://platform.instabase.com) website will continue to work.
We have internal environments that can replace platform.instabase.com (http://platform.instabase.com) but I assume that you'd like to keep a public-facing URL
Yup website is separate. The public website is on instabase.com (http://instabase.com). platform.instabase.com (http://platform.instabase.com) became an internal only environment quite some time ago.

Heymian, I was referring to this https://ib-internal.prod.instabase.com/account/login?next=%2F as internal environment whereas platform.instabase.com (http://platform.instabase.com) is a public facing environment :slightly_smiling_face:
platform.instabase.com (http://platform.instabase.com) is also only for internal employees
platform.instabase.com (http://platform.instabase.com) ~~ enterprise prod has a lot of marketplace apps, their golden data, models, etc.

I think we should switch 24.07’s db and s3 storage over to what platform.instabase.com (http://platform.instabase.com) is currently pointed to, that will preserve all the data we’ve accumulated over the years
Yeah — all my pre-AI Hub demos, data, povs, etc. are here
^^ yup that is a better way to transition - do both db and s3

yup, had brought this up with jtau already as part of the transition plan, so should be on his/their team's radar. Discussion + some more details here https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C07A2139TCM/p1738796641009069?thread_ts=1738687319.339439&cid=C07A2139TCM
